title: Tricky Summer Holidays (with Alan Whitehead MP)
itunes:title: Tricky Summer Holidays (with Alan Whitehead MP)
description:
Alan Whitehead, Labour MP for Southampton Test, says he's not planning a foreign holiday even with restrictions being eased. He tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Roger Hearing the government guidance needs to be clearer and give some certainty.

ABTA's Sean Tipton says the U.K. government is being much more restrictive than in Europe. With the price of holidays in the U.K. soaring, he says holidays abroad are not just a right but a necessity for many.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
